trans-unit.source: An **ISEMenuItemCollection** object is a collection of **ISEMenuItem** objects.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto **ISEMenuItemCollection** é uma coleção de objetos **ISEMenuItem**.

trans-unit.source: It is an instance of the Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEMenuItemCollection class.
An example is the **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.AddOnsMenu.Submenus** object that is used to customize the **Add\-On** menu in Windows PowerShellÂ® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE).
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo é o objeto **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.AddOnsMenu.Submenus**, que é usado para personalizar o menu **Complemento** no ISE (Ambiente de Script Integrado) do Windows PowerShell®.

trans-unit.source: Add\(string DisplayName, System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock Action, System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture Shortcut
trans-unit.target: Add\(string DisplayName, System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock Action, System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture Shortcut

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Suportado no Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 e posteriores.

trans-unit.source: Adds a menu item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um item de menu à coleção.

trans-unit.source: **DisplayName** The display name of the menu to be added.
trans-unit.target: **DisplayName** O nome de exibição do menu a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: **Action** The **System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock** object that specifies the action that is associated with this menu item.
trans-unit.target: **Action** O objeto **System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock** que especifica a ação associada a este item de menu.

trans-unit.source: **Shortcut** The keyboard shortcut for the action.
trans-unit.target: **Shortcut** O atalho de teclado desta ação.

trans-unit.source: **Returns** The ISEMenuItem object that was just added.
trans-unit.target: **Returns** O objeto ISEMenuItem que acabou de ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Suportado no Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 e posteriores.

trans-unit.source: Removes all submenus from the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os submenus do item de menu.

trans-unit.target: [O objeto ISEMenuItem](The-ISEMenuItem-Object.md) [O modelo de objeto de script do ISE do Windows PowerShell](The-Windows-PowerShell-ISE-Scripting-Object-Model.md) [Referência de modelo de objeto do ISE do Windows PowerShell](Windows-PowerShell-ISE-Object-Model-Reference.md) [A hierarquia de modelo de objeto do ISE](The-ISE-Object-Model-Hierarchy.md)
